fields_of_interest: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: open science, open data, open access, data protection, new data technologies, big data, FAIR data
organisation_name: Consortium of European Social Science Data Archives (CESSDA ERIC)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: CESSDA provides large-scale, integrated and sustainable data services to the social sciences. It brings together social science data archives across Europe, with the aim of promoting the results of social science research and supporting national and international research and cooperation. CESSDA ERIC wants to be a key player in the social sciences domain providing: (a) a trusted platform with tools and services to curate, publish and reuse research data; and (b) training to the research community throughout the research life cycle.
relevant_communication:
Four ongoing Horizon 2020 projects: https://www.cessda.eu/Projects 
 
CESSDA operates on the basis of yearly work plans, which are made up of a number of tasks: https://www.cessda.eu/Projects/Work-Plans
